title: If no webapps are deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
description:
I have downloaded Tomcat 7 from http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip. After starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, I accessed a URL. Instead of receiving the expected HTTP error 404, the server returned an HTTP code 200 OK with no content.

Ali Tokmen - http://ali.tokmen.com/
OB: When accessing a URL after starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, the server returns an HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
EB: When accessing a URL after starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, the server should return an HTTP error 404.
SR:
1. Download Tomcat 7 from http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip.
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed.
3. Access a URL.
4. Observe that the server returns an HTTP code 200 OK with no content instead of an HTTP error 404.
